Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Scrapper Gauntlets

  1. I have a character with a Reactive Armor. I play a Scrapper Gauntlets on that character. My opponent only has a single Armor in play. What is the timing on the triggers here? Are they considered simultaneous, or does one need to happen before the other?
    They trigger simultaneously and you resolve them in an order of your choosing.
  2. What battle cards are in the Devestator Pack?
    3 x Primary Laser
    2 x Improvised Shield
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Scrapper Gauntlets
    3 x Grenade Launcher
    3 x Blast Shield
    3 x Builder's Tools
    3 x Rapid Conversion
    2 x Ramming Speed
    3 x Pep Talk
    3 x Reclaim
    3 x Work Overtime
    3 x Heavy Landing
    3 x Constructicon Engima
  3. If Thrust has a Grenade Launcher and boosts a character that is attacking, and the opponent reveals a Bolster, to play a Scrapper Gauntlets to scrap the Grenade Launcher, does Thrust donate 7 or 3 attack to the attacking character?
    7 attack. The amount has already been locked in.
  4. Wheeljack is in car mode is equipped with the following:
    Multi-Tool, Turbo Boosters, and Scrapper Gauntlets.
    Bumblebee - Courageous Scout is tapped, in car mode, and equipped with the following:
    Drill Arms, Crushing Size, and Multi Mission Gear.
    For my action, I play Swap Parts between Wheeljack and Bumblebee. There are a LOT of abilities that fire off here and I'm curious to know, what would be the appropriate order? Most importantly, when does Wheeljack's ability take priority?
    These would all trigger at the same, so you would choose the order they happen in.
  5. If one of my opponent’s characters has a Weapon, can I choose not to scrap it and draw a card?
    No. If there is an enemy Weapon, you must scrap it. You draw a card only if you can’t scrap an enemy Weapon.
  6. If a character is equipped with 3 Combat Drones and the enemy plays a card such as Scrapper Gauntlets which scraps an enemy weapon, would just 1 of the 3 Combat Drones be scrapped or all 3? Thanks for all you guys do! Wave 2 is amazing!
    Just 1 and no, YOU’RE AMAZING.
